title: From Libra to Diem: Facebook-Backed Crypto Project Changes Name
text: Goodbye Libra and hello Diem. Facebook's cryptocurrency project on Tuesday (Dec. 1) unveiled a new name as it seeks to put some distance between itself and its powerful but controversial Big Tech sponsor.

title: Jim Cramer: Charts show more upside for Facebook, Apple, Amazon and Netflix
text: "If the FAANG stocks can stay on the market's good side, then the charts, as interpreted by Carolyn Boroden, suggest they have a lot more room to run," Cramer said.

title: Cramer charts out Facebook, Apple, Amazon and Netflix year-end runs
text: "If the FAANG stocks can stay on the market's good side, then the charts, as interpreted by Carolyn Boroden, suggest they have a lot more room to run," the "Mad Money" host said.

title: Big Tech's stock market reign may finally be about to end
Bay Crest Partners' Jonathan Krinsky on whether FANG stocks look due for a breakout
text: Jonathan Krinsky, chief market technician at Bay Crest Partners, discusses his market outlook with CNBC's "Halftime" traders, specifically about whether Big Tech stocks like Facebook, Amazon, Netflix and Google can reassert their leadership.

title: The Libra Cryptocurrency Rebrands As 'Diem'
text: Roughly a year and a half after Facebook Inc. (NASDAQ: FB) announced it was creating a new digital currency, it has now rebranded that cryptocurrency as it continues to work toward regulatory approval. What Happened?

title: Facebook's controversial cryptocurrency gets a new name: Diem
text: The project will be a stripped-down version of the original plan, according to a report.

title: Key Words: CNBC's Jim Cramer says these ‘best in show' stocks remain the place for your investment dollars
text: The "Mad Money" host made the bullish case this week for Facebook, Apple, Amazon, Netflix and Google parent Alphabet, even as the "smart money" keeps pushing the idea that it's time to move out of Big Tech and into value plays.

title: Facebook-backed Libra Association has been renamed Diem
text: The renaming follows Facebook's rebranding of its digital wallet earlier this year to Novi from Calibra.

title: Facebook-backed Libra Association rebrands as Diem
text: The Libra Association, a consortium created by Facebook to support its Libra cryptocurrency efforts, announced this morning that it has a new name — the Diem Association — and made some key hires ahead of its launch. This is just the latest course correction since the Libra project was announced last year.

title: Facebook-backed cryptocurrency changes name in an effort to seek approval
text: A struggling cryptocurrency backed by Facebook has changed its name, in a bid to get it off the ground and approved by regulators.

title: Facebook-backed digital coin Libra renamed Diem in quest for approval
text: Facebook-backed cryptocurrency Libra has been rebranded "Diem" in a renewed effort to gain regulatory approval by stressing the project's independence.

title: From hate speech to nudity, Facebook's oversight board picks its first cases
text: Facebook Inc's independent oversight board announced on Tuesday the first six cases where it could overrule the social media company's decisions to remove certain pieces of content from its platforms.

title: Facebook To Launch News Service In UK In January, With Major Outlets Onboard
text: Facebook Inc (NASDAQ: FB) said Monday it will launch Facebook News in the United Kingdom in January 2021 and that it plans to pay publishers for content not already on the platform. What Happened: With the inclusion of the first wave of publishers, Facebook News would carry content from The Guardian, The Independent, The Economist, The London Evening News, The Mirror, and The Scotsman.
